item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Intro to passkeys # What is a passkey? Commodo pariatur laboris excepteur excepteur ut nostrud voluptate. What is the difference between a passkey and a multi-device credential? blah What is the difference between a single-device passkey and a multi-device passkey? Ipsum officia dolore incididunt consequat laborum. Do security keys support passkeys? Today, security keys hold single-device passkeys, as they are bound to the authenticator. Security key vendors may decide to offer multi-device passkey authenticators in the future.
